name: Impact (KidStuff)
overview: A kart style racing game that incorporates a level of chance wherein the distance you can move around the track is impacted by somewhat random dice rolls, you must avoid track effects like water and use limited bombs effectively to come in first. Striking your opponent from the rear could end up moving them forward. The game was developed by KidStuff ( original game design by D. Robb and S. Pullinger with additional design by B. Carr ) and released via Licenseware in 1994. When you strike a competitor you will hear the children exclaim, "Impact!"
